column2: m <- bam(strike ~ s(px, pz, by = factor(stand)) +
p3fb <- strikeFX(noswing, model = m,  layer = x)
pitchRx assumes the height of each batter is recorded as 'b_height'. Since there is no such column, we will assume each batter has a height of 6'2''
geom_point(data = noswing, aes(x = noswing$PlateLocSide, y = noswing$PlateLocHeight, color=noswing$PitchCall)) + ggtitle("Zone Overlay") +ylim(0,5) + xlim(-3,3)
